languages.text: "Прежде чем упрекать меня в моих решениях, подумай — скольких наших собратьев тебе удалось спасти в пустоте средь местных звезд? И {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}могла ли ты спасти больше{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "Прежде, чем упрекать меня в моих решениях, подумай — скольких наших собратьев тебе удалось спасти в пустоте средь местных звезд? И могла ли ты спасти больше?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Прежде чем упрекать меня в моих решениях, подумай — скольких наших собратьев тебе удалось спасти в пустоте средь местных звезд? И {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}могла ли ты спасти больше{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And how many more you could have saved."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Antes de que me reprendas por mis decisiones, piensa en cuántos de los míos lograste salvar en el vacío que separa las estrellas locales. Y a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}cuántos más pudiste haber salvado{/d}».
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de que me reprendas por mis decisiones, piensa en cuántos de los míos lograste salvar en el vacío que separa las estrellas locales. Y a cuántos más pudiste haber salvado».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “在你责备我的决定之前，先想想看，你在群星之间的虚空中拯救过多少我们的族人，还有{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}你本可以拯救多少人{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “在你责备我的决定之前，先想想看，你在群星之间的虚空中拯救过多少我们的族人，还有你本可以拯救多少人。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Avant de condamner mes choix, demandez-vous combien de nos semblables vous avez réussi à sauver dans le néant qui sépare ces étoiles et {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}combien d'autres vous auriez pu secourir{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de condamner mes choix, demandez-vous combien de nos semblables vous avez réussi à sauver dans le néant qui sépare ces étoiles et combien d'autres vous auriez pu secourir. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「私の決断を叱責する前に、お前が星々の間の空白地帯で、どれだけの血族を救うことができたか考えてみるといい。そして、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}あと何人救えたかもな{/d}」
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「私の決断を叱責する前に、お前が星々の間の空白地帯で、どれだけの血族を救うことができたか考えてみるといい。そして、あと何人救えたかもな」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Bevor Ihr mich für meine Entscheidungen tadelt, bedenkt, wie viele unserer Brüder und Schwestern Ihr in der Leere zwischen den örtlichen Sternen retten könnt. Und {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}wie viele mehr Ihr hättet retten können{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor Ihr mich für meine Entscheidungen tadelt, bedenkt, wie viele unserer Brüder und Schwestern Ihr in der Leere zwischen den örtlichen Sternen retten könnt. Und wie viele mehr Ihr hättet retten können."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Kararlarımdan dolayı bana kusur bulmadan önce yöredeki yıldızların arasında uzanan uçsuzda ne kadar soydaşımızı kurtarmayı başardığını ve {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}fırsatın olsaydı daha ne kadarını kurtarabileceğini{/d} düşün."
languages.original_text: "Before you chide me for my decisions, consider how many of our kin you managed to save in the void between the local stars. And {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}how many more you could have saved{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Kararlarımdan dolayı bana kusur bulmadan önce yöredeki yıldızların arasında uzanan uçsuzda ne kadar soydaşımızı kurtarmayı başardığını ve {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}fırsatın olsaydı daha ne kadarını kurtarabileceğini{/d} düşün."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
